mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DATAKEY, t1.DEDATACHGID, t1.DEDATACHGNAME, t1.DEID, t1.DENAME, t1.EVENTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDEDATACHG t1
SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DATAKEY`, t1.`DEDATACHGID`, t1.`DEDATACHGNAME`, t1.`DEID`, t1.`DENAME`, t1.`EVENTTYPE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_DEDATACHG` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DATAKEY, t1.DEDATACHGID, t1.DEDATACHGNAME, t1.DEID, t1.DENAME, t1.EVENTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDEDATACHG t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DATAKEY AS DATAKEY, t1.DEDATACHGID AS DEDATACHGID, t1.DEDATACHGNAME AS DEDATACHGNAME, t1.DEID AS DEID, t1.DENAME AS DENAME, t1.EVENTTYPE AS EVENTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDEDATACHG t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DATAKEY AS DATAKEY, t1.DEDATACHGID AS DEDATACHGID, t1.DEDATACHGNAME AS DEDATACHGNAME, t1.DEID AS DEID, t1.DENAME AS DENAME, t1.EVENTTYPE AS EVENTTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDEDATACHG t1
SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[DATAKEY], t1.[DEDATACHGID], t1.[DEDATACHGNAME], t1.[DEID], t1.[DENAME], t1.[EVENTTYPE], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFDEDATACHG] t1
